And on the third day loosen the bandage and administer a great infusion of warm water or tea, and then cure that with unguent of basil with rose oil and others so that the pla
Capitol .v.	Chapter five.
De la cura de lagramas per catartz e als huels descendentz de las partidas dedintz del cap.	Of the cure of wounds by cauterization and of the bowels which descend from parts within the head.
Quan ad alcu veno catartz agutz e continuantz, e vezes les huels del malaute extenuatz petitz, e ja le reguardament de lor es debelitat, e las palpebras ulceradas e de lor cazo les pels, e en le preon del cap es dolor aguda ledent e extrenutacio consequent, lahoras sapias per aquestz accidentz que las materias e catartz no veno sino de motas venas de las partidas dedintz procedent.	When then cauteries are done and continued, and the bowels of the patient exhausted feeble, and the eyelids ulcerated and their hair fallen out, and in the forehead is acute pain and intense tension consequent, then know by these accidents that the materials and cauteries do not come but from few veins which proceed from parts within.
E la milhor curacio en aquels es aquesta: que comandes al malaute que raza lo sieu front, e aprop inscideys en aquel una fissura al mieg loc del front, un petit per la latitut (e comensa am la fissura del templar senestre entro al dextre templar; e sia inscisio entro al os; e eslongua la tua ma dels lacertz del templas lesquals son maugutz deves la mastigacio), entro que sia le os descubert.	And the best cure in those is this: command the patient to wash his forehead, and then cut into that a fissure at the middle place of the forehead, a little by length (and begin with the fissure of the left temple into the right temple; let it be an incision into the bone; and lengthen your hand from the tear glands of the temples which are bitten because of mastication), so that the bone is uncovered.
Exsicca tot le sanc am espongua o am drap secc e aprop repleys entre las doas labias de la fissura am coto vielh o am draps de li.	Dry up all the blood with sponge or with dry cloth and then fill between the two lips of the fissure with old bone or with strips of linen.
E aprop estrenh desus am polvils enbegutz en vi e oli per so que no endevengua apostema caut.	And then bind it up with bandages soaked in wine and oil so that there be no pus.
E quan deslias aquo e veses que l’apostema ja es diminuit, lahoras cove que fregua le os entro que comensa en lu nayser carn, e aprop cura aquel am regiment exsiccatiu le qual fassa neysser la carn, ayssi cum si tu prenes de farina de froment dos partidas e de colofania quatre partidas e mescla o, e de lor sia fayt emplastre e sia aministrat en aquestas plaguas a de la carn nativitat.	And when you have removed that and see that the apostema is diminished, then know that the cauterization of the bone begins where the new flesh begins, and then cure that with an astringent regimen which makes the flesh, like this as if you took flour of wheat two parts and of resin four parts and mix them together, and of their mixture make a plaster and administer it to these wounds of the native flesh.
Capitol .vi.	Chapter six.
De la cura de aquo que catz en las aurelhas.	Of the cure of what is cauterized in the ears.
Tota causa que catz en las aurelhas es una de quatre specias, quar o es peyra mineral o causa semblant a peyra, ayssi cum ferr e veyre, o es de planta ayssi cum ceze o fava, o es causa fluxtibla ayssi cum aygua e vi agre e a lor semblantz, o alcuna bestia.	The whole cause that cauterizes in the ears is one of four species, for it may be mineral stone or cause similar to stone, like iron and vinegar, or it may be plant like celery or bean, or it may be volatile cause like water and sour wine and their similars, or any animal.
E donc quan peyra catz en l’aurelha o autra causa semblant de aquelas causas que no ajustan ne creysso en l’aurelha, e pausa la aurelha al solelh, e si vezes la peyra, lahoras distilla en aquela alcuna causa de oli violat o sizami, e aprop aministra la extraccio de lu, e fay le stornudar am condizi, e oppila las nars deve le aveniment de stornutacio.	And when you see a stone in the ear or other similar cause that does not go away or grow in the ear, and you hold the ear towards the sun, and if you see the stone, then distill it with some oil of violets or sesame, and then administer its extraction, and make the person sneeze with snuff, and close the nostrils after the sneezing.
E aprop pausa en le circuit de la aurelha alscunas pessas de drap o lana, e dextendas la aurelha a las partidas desus, quar motas veguadas es foro-getada am aquestas causas.	And then place some pieces of cloth or wool in the ear canal, and extend the ear upwards, for it is often cured by these means.
E si no n’es getada, lahoras aministra extraccio de lu am le instrument apelat gesti epicicarios subtil del qual aquesta es la forma:	And if it is not cured, then administer its extraction with the instrument called a subtle epicyclet, of which this is the form:
E si es foro-getada am gesti, bo es; e sino, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am onci subtil de pauca duplicacio.	And if it is cured by the epicyclet, that is good; and if not, then administer its extraction with a thin needle of slight thickness, made with few turns.
E donc si no es foro-getada per aquo, lahoras fay una canula de aram e entromet la extremitat de la canula en le trauc de la aurelha e claus a l’enviro de la canula am cera e am oli mollificada per so que no sia ubert sino la canula.	And if it is not cured by that, then make a tube of brass and insert the end of the tube into the hole of the ear, and close around the tube with wax and softened oil, so that nothing goes inside except the tube.
E aprop extratz am le tieu vent am fort atraccio, quar tropas veguadas cum aquo que havem recontat.	Then pull it out with your thumb with a strong吸引力, for it often comes out with this method that we have described.
Mays si no es foro-getada en aquesta manieyra, lahoras pren de halka alumbat o de vecz aparelhat am le qual son preses les ausels una patita quantitat, e pausa aquel en la extremitat de ray, e aprop envolopa sobre aquel coto decentment pausat.	But if it is not cured in this manner, then take a little bit of alumbated wool or of wax prepared with which birds' nests are taken, and place that on the end of the ray, and then wrap that part decently placed.
E aprop entromet aquel en le trauc de la aurelha am facilitat, e aprop excicca la aurelha de la humiditat.	Then insert that into the hole of the ear with ease, and then dry the ear from humidity.
E donc si no es foro-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recontadas, lahoras tu coyta a talhar aquela denant que endevengua apostema caut o espasme.	And if it is not cured by all the causes we have described, then you cut it before it becomes an abscess or spasm.
E la manieyra de talhar aquela es que tu al comensament sancnes le malaute de la vena sephasica e extratz del sanc segon la mannieyra de la vertut de lu, e aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas e converteys l’aurelha a las partidas desus, e fen am petita fissura en la razit de la aurelha deves lo greys de lu en le loc be premegut de lu.	And the way to cut it is that you first bleed the patient from the vein on the side of the ear and stop the bleeding according to the nature of the wound, and then you close your hand over the wound and turn the ear upwards, and make a small incision at the root of the ear, where you have previously pricked it.
E sia la fissura de figura lunar entro que pervengua a la peyra, e, la peyra atrobada, osta aquela si podes am instrumentz apropriatz; e aprop cos la fissura en aquela hora am velocitat, e cura aquela entro que sia sanat.	And let the incision be moon-shaped so that it reaches the stone; and if the stone is found, remove it with appropriate instruments; and then close the incision at once, and cure it until it is healed.
E si la causa cazent en la aurelha es un dels gras que creysso e so inflatz, lahoras aministra la curacio e la extraccio de lu; mays si no obezeys a tu ad eyssiment, lahoras tu pren spatum teune subtil segon aquesta forma:	And if the cause is a growth in the ear that has become swollen and inflated, then administer its cure and extraction; but if it does not obey your treatment, then you take a thin spatulum according to this form:
e aministra am aquel la abscizio de aquel gra lo qual es cazut en l’aurelha.	and with that administer the incision of that growth which is fallen into the ear.
E no fassas aquo quan cogitas que aquel ja es humectat per la vapor del aurelha, e pausa aquel en motas pessas, e prop extratz ne aquelas am les oncis o am gesti subtil, o ab inscizio ayssi co dit havem, quar es alleujada la extraccio de lu.	And do not do that when you think it is already moistened by the vapor of the ear; and place it in some pieces, and then extract those with needles or a thin instrument, or with an incision as we have described, for its extraction is thus made easier.
Mays en l’aygua la qual es intrada en l’aurelha cove que·l malaute use de sternutacio am condizi al comensament, e omple la sieua aurelha am alcu coto vielh, e jagua sobre aquela aurelha en la qual es l’aygua, e si per aquo es foro-getada, bo es; e sino, lahoras pren tropas peyras teunas e leons segon la longitut del dit, e calfa aquelas en le foc un pauc, e le pacient entrometa una de aquelas en le trauc de la sua aurelha e saute sobre la un pe sieu de aquela partida e percussia am una autra peyra sobre la peyra la qual es dintz la aurelha.	But in the water which has entered the ear because of sneezing with snuff at the beginning, and fill your own ear with some old cloth, and spit on that ear in which is the water, and if it is cured by that, good; and if not, then take thin stones the size of fingers according to their length, and heat those in the fire a little, and let the patient insert one of those into the hole of his ear, and suck on the other stone with his mouth from that end and strike with the other stone on the stone which is in the ear.
Donc no cesse aquo am peyra entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada.	So do not cease that until all the water is extracted.
E ja l’aygua sira foro-getada enayssi que tu prenguas de papier o de gonc .i., e met la una extremetat de lu en l’aurelha e estendas l’autre extremitat am foc entro que sia comburit le may de lu.	And when the water is extracted so that you take out paper or wax, and place one end of it in the ear and extend the other end with fire until its thread is burned.
E prop met i autre gonc e fay aquo tantas veguadas entro que tota l’aygua sia foro-getada, e stratz aquel am canula ayssi co desus es dit de la peyra extrasadora.	Then put in another piece and do that as many times until all the water is extracted; and then tie that with a tube as we have described for the stone extractor.
Mays en la extraccio de bestia intrant en aquela aurelha, si es a petit cos, ayssi piussa e a lu semblant, cura aquel ayssi cum havem dit en la divisio; mays si es de gran cos la qual causa apar al sen del vezement, lahoras aministra la extraccio de lu am gesti e oncis, e la causa de lu es pus leugiera de totas las autras causas que cazo en l’aurelha.	But in the extraction of a foreign body entering that ear, if it is a small thing like pus and similar to it, cure it as we have said in the division; but if it is a large thing causing a wound on the eardrum, then administer its extraction with instruments and needles, and the cause of it is a long-standing disease longer than all other diseases that affect the ear.
Mays en la extraccio de verm engendrat en la aurelha, quan tu curas aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio e en le tractat de distillacios e no comfereys la tua curacio, lahoras cove que tu reguardes la aurelha al solelh.	But in the extraction of a worm generated in the ear, when you cure it as we have said in the division and in the treatise on distillation, and do not trust your cure, then look at the ear towards the sun.
E donc si apar aqui alcuna causa dels verms, lahoras extratz aquel am gesti o am onci subtils, mays si no apar deguna causa, lahoras pren una canula dejos streyta e desus ampla de la qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if you see some cause of the worms, then extract that with instruments or thin needles; but if you see no cause, then take a tube which is narrow at the bottom and wide on top, of which this is the form:
E entromet la extremitat subtil en la aurelha segon la quantitat la qual suffertar puesca le malaute; e aprop sucgeys am aquela per succio fort, e fay aquo motas veguadas, entro que totz les verms sian foro-gitatz.	And insert the thin end in the ear according to the amount which the patient can endure; and then suck it strongly with that many times until all the worms are extracted.
Mays si no obezeysso a tu al ayssiment, lahoras tu opila e claus en le circuit de la canula am cera ayssi cum havem dit; lahoras aministre distillacios las quals han ja esproadas les antics en la curacio dels verms, e atrobaras aquo en le tractat de distillacios.	But if it does not obey your treatment, then plug and close the tube all around with wax as we have said; then administer distillations which have already been tried by the ancients in the cure of worms, and you will find that in the treatise on distillation.
E sia la tua efusio am la qual efundas les olis medicinas en la aurelha am aquest strument del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And let your effusion with which you pour the medicinal oils into the ear be with that instrument of which this is the form:
E fay aquela de argent o de eram, dejos streyt, en le qual sia un petit trauc, e am pla desus.	And make that of silver or brass, narrow at the bottom and wide on top, in which there is a small hole, and flat on top.
E donc sia cum empellent a que es en la conquavitat de la canula de continent aqui on sira necessari.	And let it be as if it were in the cavity of the tube that contains what is necessary here.
E si vols, pren le ray e envolveys en la extremitat de lu decentment coto, e aprop gieta oli en la concavitat del auziment, o suc de alcuna herba, o aquo que vols de aquestas medicinas en la canula — e aquela es en la aurelha —, e aprop entromet le ray am coto desus e exprem am la tua ma aquel am compressio temprada de lu entro que l’oli sia expellit en la concavitat del auziment e le malaute senta le oli dedintz.	And if you want, take the spatulum and wrap its end decently with a cloth, and then pour oil into the cavity of the instrument, or squeeze some herb, or whatever you want of these medicines in the tube — and that is in the ear —, and then insert the spatulum with the cloth on top and press it with your hand until the oil is forced out of the cavity and the patient feels the oil within.
E aquo que sia enfundut en la aurelha sia ja scalfat am foc un petit.	And whatever is put in the ear, let it be heated by fire a little.
E guarda te que la causa la qual distillaras en l’aurelha no sia trop frega, quar las medicinas de aurelha no suffertan aquo.	And beware that the cause which you distill in the ear is not too hot, for the medicines of the ear cannot endure that.
Capitol .vii.	Chapter 7.
De curacio de opilacio de aurelhas.	On the cure of pain in the ears.
Alcunas veguadas alcus enfantz yeysso dels ventres de lors mayres no-perforatz, e aquo ja accideys en alcus homes, opilacio en le meat de la aurelha per plagua o per carn nada en aquela; e aquesta opilacio alcunas veguadas es fayta en le preon del trau de la aurelha la qual no consiec le vezement, e alcunas veguadas es en las partidas defora.	Sometimes some children are born with pain in their ears, and that happens in some adults as well, opilacio in the middle of the ear by pus or by nothing at all in that spot; and this opilacio sometimes occurs in the middle of the ear canal which does not affect the eardrum, and sometimes it is on the outside.
E aquela que accideys en le preon de lu, la qual no comprehen le vezement, es en las majors disposicios de dificil sanacio.	And that which happens in the middle of it, which does not affect the eardrum, is in the most difficult dispositions for curing.
E en aquela en qual consegueys le vezement, cove que tu pauses la aurelha del malaute al solelh e reguarda en aquela.	And when you achieve that, look at the ear towards the sun.
E donc si vezes oppulacio apparent, obre aquela am espatum subtil del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if you see an abscess, open it with a thin spatulum of which this is the form:
Si’ la extremitat de lu en la qual sia petita la latitut, del qual la una partida sia aguda e l’autra no; e le spatum sia de dos latz leon per so que no fassa lizio al aurelha.	If its end is narrow and one side is sharp while the other is not, and the spatulum is of two edges so that it does not hurt the ear.
E donc si la opilacio es per carn nascuda en la aurelha o en le meat de lu, lahoras te aquela am oncis subtils e incidiys aquela vehement facilitat entro que sia ostada tota la carn.	And if the swelling is due to flesh grown in the ear or in his head, then cut it away with sharp knives, carefully and gently, until all the flesh is removed.
E si opilacio es en le preon de la aurelha, lahoras pren ray subtil leon e escalfa aquel am foc un pauc, e aprop met aquel en le meat de l’aurelha.	And if the swelling is in the ear canal, then take a thin rod and heat it in fire a little, and then put it into the ear canal.
E donc si as scentit oppulacio am aquo que le malaute atroba am facilitat, per gravetat de ausir, esforsa la oppressio de lu am facilitat; e guarda te que no plagues les nervis del aurelha.	And if you have felt the swelling with water that the patient drinks easily, due to the difficulty of breathing, relieve his oppression easily; and beware lest you irritate the nerves of the ear.
E aprop pausa en l’aurelha drap de li segon la quantitat del ample del trauc lo qual tu as envolvutz en l’enguent egipciac; e fay aquo per alcus jorns entro que sias segur de la consolidacio de la plagua; o que prenguas qualgua e enfon aquela en ayguaros e pulveriza sobre lu segi trissat e usa de lu; e si vezes la aurelha ja esser apostemada, lahoras cove que tu estraguas la qualgua e permutes aquela am autra qualgua la qual tu envoloparas en cerot que sia fayt am oli rozat, entro que sia le apostema caut cedat; e aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then put into the ear a cloth of the size of the wound that you have wrapped in Egyptian ointment; and do this for several days until you are sure that the ulcer is healing; or take some of it and dissolve it in water, and spray it on the patient's mouth, using a sprayer, and use it; and if you see that the ear is already suppurating, then cut away the dead flesh and replace it with fresh flesh, which you will wrap in cerated ointment made from rose oil, until the suppuration stops; and then heal it.
Mays si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras submergeys esponga o drap en aygua frega e pausa sobre la aurelha, e usa del autra curacio la qual restrengeys le flux del sanc, la qual es dita en le tractat de distillacio.	But if blood flows, then soak a sponge or cloth in water and place it over the ear; and use the other cure which restricts the flow of blood, as is described in the treatise on distillation.
Capitol .viii.	Chapter 8.
De cura de athezil le qual endeveno a las palpebras.	Of the treatment of athezia, which occurs in the eyelids.
Athezil les quals endeveno a las paupebras dels huels alcuna veguada so humitz, alscunas veguadas son secs.	Athezia occurs in the eyelids due to some humidity, sometimes it is dry.
Donc cove que tu tenguas aquels am tenhalhas o am onci, e inscindas aquels am espatum de las suas razitz, e aprop pausa sobre les locs segi trissat.	Therefore, you should have them cut with tweezers or a sharp knife, and remove them from their roots; and place the cut end of the piece on the affected area, using a pointed instrument.
Mays si dolor am flux de sanc veno, lahoras tu cauteriza aquels am cauteri lanticular subtil.	But if pain comes with the flow of blood, then you should cauterize them with a very fine pointed cautery.
E la milhor cauterizacio es aprop las inscizios e tropas veguadas retornam quan reman alcuna causa de sas razitz; e quan so cauterizadas am foc, aquelas razitz son comburidas e no retornan.	And the best cauterization is when the cuts are made and the roots are pulled out, after some cause has returned them to their roots; and when they are cauterized with fire, those roots are burned and do not return.
Capitol .ix.	Chapter 9.
Cura de grandeyssa que veno a las palpebras dels huels.	The cure for granulation that occurs in the eyelids of people.
Motas veguadas endeve en las palpebras dels huels alcuna causa la qual es asemblada a grandissa en sa fortalicia e duricia, e per so grandissia es apelada.	Often it occurs in the eyelids of people due to some cause which resembles granulation in its strength and hardness; and therefore granulation is called.
E es agreguacio de humiditat grossa en la palpebra dejos e desus.	And it is an accumulation of thick humidity in the eyelid, both below and above.
Donc la opperacio en lor es que consideras lahoras si la grandissia es procedent en lu en aquo que apar de la palpebra e es mauguda a tota partida; e la causa de lu es leugiera.	Therefore, the operation on it is that you should consider whether the granulation comes from something that appeared under or above the eyelid and has spread everywhere; and the cause of it is ulceration.
Donc fen sobre aquela am fissura per la latitut, e aprop escorga aquela de tota partida am facilitat entro que evasesca, e aprop suspen aquela am onci e abscindeys aquela.	Therefore, cut it open with a wide slit, and then scrape away the granulation all around with ease, until it is eliminated; and suspend it with a knife and excise it.
Mays si a tu no es apparelhada la incizio de lu si no pus que penetras la palpebra am inscizio pauc a pauc, lahoras aquo no notz en deguna causa.	But if you are not equipped for the incision of it, unless there is pus penetrating the eyelid, a little at a time, then this will not be noticed in any way.
E si la figura es gran, lahoras tu l’ajusta am sutura; e cura aquela entro que sia sanada.	And if the size of it is large, then you should stitch it up; and cure it until it is healed.
E si es pauca, a tu no sobrevindra mal per aquela quar l’anguent de lu restaura aquela e encarna.	And if it is small, you will not suffer harm from it because the eye's moisture restores it and incorporates it.
E si la grandissia es declinant a las partidas dedintz de la palpebra deves la superficia dedintz, lahoras evesa la palpebra e suspen la grandissia am onci, otra que tu indigescas de incizio, e prem aquela de tota part, e si la palpebra per inscizio es alonguada, aquo no notz en deguna causa.	And if the granulation is declining towards the inner edges of the eyelid, then you should eviscerate the eyelid and lift up the granulation with a knife; cut away any other cause of it that you find there, and press down on it from all sides, and if the eyelid is elongated by the incision, then this will not be noticed in any way.
E aprop la incizio, lava le huel am aygua salada; e cura le loc am aquo que encarna entro que sia sanat.	Then wash the eye with salted water, and cure the wound so that it incorporates into the skin until it is healed.
Capitol .x.	Chapter 10.
De la cura axcirnah en la palpebra desus del huel.	Of the cure of a cyst in the eyelid, above the eye.
Axcirnath es grays le qual es engendrat en las tunicas de la palpebra desus, e majorment endeve als enfantz, agrava les huels de aquels et accideyso a lor catartz le mayti; e no podon reguardar la claror del solelh per aquo quar lagremas se coytan ad aquels.	A cyst is a grayle growth which is generated in the eyelids, above the eye, and mostly occurs in children; it damages the eyes of those who experience it, and they cannot bear to look at the brightness of the sun because tears are drawn towards them.
E per so tu vezes aquels jaser sobre les lors caras tot temps, e sobre les lors caras dormen; e so a las palpebras de lor dejos les sobrecils humidas, las quals ja ha cuberta imflacio, e iminencia de accernac apparent es en l’uelh; e que quant tu premes le loc am les tieus ditz, tu centes accernac entro aquels.	And so you will see them hanging down over their faces all the time, and sleeping over their faces; and so, under their eyebrows, the eyelids are moistened with cystic swelling, which appears as a protuberance in the eye; and when you press the spot with your finger, you feel that protuberance within.
E alcuna manieyra de opperacio es en aquel que le malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop pausa drap de li e de lu fay calgua, e fay de lu cercle segon la quantitat la qual contena arthernach de tota partida, e aprop pausa aquel sobre aquela e prem am les tieus ditz de tota per que sia agreguat arcernac en le mieg del cercle, e aprop fen en le mieg de aquela humiditat am spatum inscident am fissura per la latitut, e la fissura no sia major que la fissura que es fayta en flaubotomia.	And another method of operation is that the patient places his head in your lap, and then you place a cloth over him and make a poultice, and make a circle according to the amount that contains arternach all around, and then place it over the cyst and press with your fingers all around so that the cystic swelling is aggregated within; and then cut out that humidity with cauterizing with fire through a slit, and let the slit not be larger than the slit made in phlebectomies.
Mays en le preon cove que tu fendas la codena tota entro que pervenguas ad arcernach, quar en las mays desposicios proceseys arcernach per fissura segon la forma de grayseza blanca.	But in the front, you should cut all the way through so that you reach the cystic swelling, for in most cases the cystic swelling appears through a slit according to the shape of white grayness.
Donc extratz aquela am draps los quals tu as envolopatz entre les tieus ditz a las partidas deforo e revolv entre la ma dextra e sinistre entro que sia dispargut.	Therefore, extract it with poultices which you have wrapped between your fingers at the parts outside and revolve between the right and left hands so that it is dispersed.
E guarda te que no ajustes en la fissura per so que am le spatum no pervenguas al huel e ladescas aquel.	And beware lest you cut into the slit with the cautery so that, when you use the cautery, you do not reach the eye and burn it.
Mays si no apar a tu arternach en le comensament de la fissura, mays que tu ajustes en la fissura un petit am fecilitat entro que procesisca arternach; e aprop extratz aquela ayssi quo havem dit; e aprop submargeys draps de li en aygua e vi agre e pausa les sobre le loc e estrenh aquels am polvils.	But if you do not reach arternach at the beginning of the slit, but only touch it slightly so that arternach processes; and then extract it as we have said; and then soak poultices in water and wine and place them over the spot and press down on those with powder.
E so alcus que trissan sal e pausan aquel en la conquavitat de la fissura per so que aquo que es remas de aquela humiditat.	And then let salt and bread remain there in the cavity of the slit, so that what remains of that humidity.
E aprop cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then cure it until it is healed.
Mays si accideys en le loc apostema caut, lahoras cura aquel am emplastres cedatils entro que sia sanat.	But if an ulcer occurs on the spot, then cure it with cauterized plaster so that it is healed.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter 11.
De manieyras de tactimi del huel.	Of methods of touching the eye.
Quan en las palpebras dels huels so natz pels ajustatz dejos les pels naturals e so antiquatz, lahoras aquels noso al huel e fan endevenir manieras de malautias ayssi cum lacrimas assiduas e mollificacio de palpebras e tela entro que aquo sia causa de destruccio del huel que s’apela tactinir del huel, e cura se en quatre manieyras: o per cauteri am foc; o am medicina acuta segon que denant es dit en le capitol de cauteri; o es fayt atactini per inscizio e sutura; o per cannas segon que yeu diyre.	When the eyelids of people are touched by foreign objects, and then they are irritated, then these cause the eye to cry profusely and soften the eyelids and membrane so that this results in the destruction of the eye, and it is called tactimi of the eye; and it is cured in four ways: either by cauterization with fire; or with sharp medicine as described in the chapter on cauterization; or it is done with an incision and suturing; or with cannulas as we will say below.
E donc cove que tu pauses le cap del malaute en le tieu se; aprop converteys la palpebra del uelh am la tua ma sinistra, e si es convertida, bo es; e sino, entromet agulha en aquela en la qual sia fiel de la partida pus dejos de la palpebra, e fay penetrar la agulha am fiel desus, e aquo sia — prop del marge de la palpebra en le qual naysso les pels — prop dels pels, e tira le fiel a las partidas desus am la palpebra, e converteys aquela am le ray.	Then place the patient's head in your lap; then lift up the eyelid of the eye with your left hand, and if it is lifted, good; but if not, insert an awl into that where there is a pus pocket below the eyelid, and let the awl penetrate above, and let it be – near the margin of the eyelid at which the lashes grow – near the lashes, and draw out the pus from above towards the eyelid, and convert that with fire.
E aprop fen en la partida dedintz de la palpebra dejos les pels ajustatz am spatum inscidentz del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal mendre; e aprop extratz le fiel e pausa dejos la palpebra polvilhs petitz de coto o de drap, e aprop senha sobre la palpebra am tenta, e sia ayssi cum figura de fuelha de mirt.	Then cut into the inner part of the eyelid where the lashes are inserted with cauterizing with fire from the lacrimal major towards the lacrimal minor; and then extract the pus and place below the eyelid small pieces of cotton or cloth, and then bind over the eyelid with a tent, and let it be thus as a sign of mirt.
Mays empero cove que sia la figura segon la quantitat de helevacio de la palpebra, quar aquo ja es diversificat en les homes, quar de aquels es le quals indigeys que sia inscidit de la palpebra gran quantitat segon la quantitat per la qual la palpebra es mollificada.	However, it is necessary to consider the shape according to the amount of swelling of the eyelid, since this differs among people; some require that a large quantity be excised from the eyelid according to the amount by which the eyelid is softened.
E aprop fen am le spatum sobre las doas linhas las quals has senhadas, e comensa del lacrimal major entro al lacrimal menor.	Then use the spatula along the two lines you drew, beginning from the larger tear duct and moving towards the smaller one.
E si’ la tua fissura prop dels pels naturals ayssi cum es la grossetut del rey.	And if the incision is near the natural hairline, make it as thick as the width of a king's hair.
E aprop met le onci en un dels dos angles de la codena, e aprop excoria aquela tota, e aprop ajusta am la scitura las doas labias am gula o fiel de lana subtil, e abstergeys le sanc, e fay adherir aquo que superflueys dels fiels sobre dos sobrecils am alcunas causas enviscans, si voles far aquo, e sino, non cures.	Then place the needle in one of the two corners of the wound, and excise all of it; then sew together the two lips with a thread made from fine wool or gut, wipe away any blood, and adhere the excess skin on the eyelids with some viscous substance if you want to do so, but if not, don't worry about it.
E aprop leyssa la sutura dels fiels entro a tres dias o quatre, e aprop cura aquo.	Then let the stitching heal within three or four days, and take care of it.
E si vols, layssa la plagua ses sutura, e cura aquela am aquo que exsicca e constrenh, quar la palpebra es alevada deves la sigillacio de la plagua e la agreguacio de lu; mays sutura es milor E donc aysso diysso les antics de taxanir.	And if you wish, let the wound remain unsutured and heal it with something that dries and constricts, for the eyelid will be raised due to the sealing of the wound and the addition of ointment; but suturing is better. And so say those who know about these things.
Mays empero en lu sia sollicitut sobre le malaute, e es de bona operacio, e no es en lu temor.	However, there should be no hurry in operating on the patient; it is a good operation and there is no danger involved.
E es autra manieyra en taxmir, e es que senhes sobre la palpebra figura ayssi cum fuelha de mirt, e aprop eleva la palpebra am tres uncis segreguatz e congreguatz segon aquesta forma:	There is another method of operating, and it involves marking a figure on the eyelid like a leaf of a myrtle tree; then elevate the eyelid using three curved and clustered hooks according to this shape:
Mays si no es possible aquo, tener les uncis, e aquo no es engualhat, lahoras pren una agula en la qual haia fil e met aquela en le mieg de la figura, e entromet le autre fiel prop le lacrimal major, e·l fiel segon prop le lacrimal mendre, e ajusta entre les tieus ditz les fiels am equalitat, e aprop am aquels eleva la tua ma am elevacio engual, eleva tota la codena sobre la qual es senhat ayssi cum havem recomtat.	However, if that is not possible, and the hooks are not available, take a needle with thread and insert it at the center of the figure; then pass the other end of the thread near the larger tear duct, and the second end near the smaller one, and tie the threads between your fingers equally, and using those, elevate your hand with an even elevation, thus lifting the entire eyelid as we have described.
E aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura, e cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	Then sew together the two lips of the wound and let it heal.
Mays si accideys apostema deves la tua inscizio o la tua fissura, seda aquel apostema am cerot e a lu semblantz, e am enguentz.	However, if an abscess occurs due to your incision or your cut, dry up that abscess with cerot and similar substances, and with ointment.
E alcunas veguadas endeve a la palpebra que·ls sieus pels sian convertitz, adonc cove que tu uses en aquela de aquo que havem dit de inscizio; mays sutura en quascus es mays artificial.	And if the hair on the eyelid has turned inwards, then you should use what we have said about incision; but suturing is more artificial.
Ataxinir am cannas es segon aquesta forma:	Operating with canes is done as follows:
e es que tu convertas la palpebra e scindas la figura qu’es dedintz segon que he recontat; e aprop per art fay doas cannas o doas astelas subtils de las quals longitut sia segon la longitut de la palpebra e la latitut de lor sia mendra de la latitut del spatum.	and it is that you convert the eyelid and split the figure within it as I have described; then with skill, make two thin canes or asteles, of which their length should be according to the length of the eyelid and their width narrower than the width of the spatula.
E tu ja has inscidit en las extremitatz de quascunas partidas, la on tenes les fils.	And you have already cut into at the ends of some of these sections, where you hold the threads.
Aprop agregua quascuna am subtilitat subre aquo que superflueys de la palpebra del huel, e constres las cannas de quascunas partidas am fort strictura, e layssa aquela per alcus jorns, quar la codena per la strictura morira e sira denegada e se poyrira entro que per si meteyssa cayra.	Then adhere each one with subtlety beneath what protrudes from the eyelid; and tie the canes in some places with a strong constriction, and let it be for several days, for the eyelid will die and turn black due to the constriction and fall off on its own.
Mays si es tardat, lahoras trenca la am las toroyras, e aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanat.	However, if it is delayed, then break it with tweezers, and let the wound heal as it should.
Donc cum es solidada, la palpebra es elevada e les pels no pungo.	Then, when it is healed, the eyelid is elevated and the hairs do not poke out.
E aquesta es la forma de doas cannas las quals faras segon aquesta forma:	And this is the form of two canes which you will make as follows:
e haia la quantitat de la longitut e de la latitut ni mays ni mens.	and have their quantity in length and width neither more nor less.
Capitol .xii.	Chapter .xii.
De elevacio de pels pungentz en le huel am agula quan le pel es dur.	Of the elevation of hairs poking out from the eyelid with a needle when the hair is thick.
Quan son pels no-naturals, durs e aspres e pungentz les huels, lahoras la operacio en lu es que tu prenguas agula subtil e pauses en aquela fiel de ceda subtil e leon, e aprop que tu ajustes las extremitatz de lu e nozes quascu en manieyra mot subtil.	When the hairs are unnatural, thick and coarse, and poke out from the eyelids, then the operation on it is that you take a thin needle and pass it through a thread made of fine silk and linen; then tie its ends in a very subtle manner.
E sia la longitut dels fiels de quantitat de una palma.	And let the length of the threads be the amount of one palm.
E aprop tu compon2 autre fiel subtil dejos lu en breu, e nuza las extremitatz de aquel si tu·t vols.	Then you place another thread beneath it briefly, and tie its ends if you wish.
E aprop pause le malaute le sieu cap en le tieu se, e sia prop del solelh per que la tua obra sia declarada, quar es operacio subtil e menuda.	And let the patient hold his head towards you, and be facing the sun so that your work is revealed, for it is a subtle and delicate operation.
E aprop intromet la agulha en la razit del pel ajustat la qual ha necessitat de engen, e fay aquela penetrar en la palpebra festinantment entro que extraguas aquela desus le pel natural.	And then insert the needle at the root of the hair which needs it, and let it pierce the eyelid swiftly as you extract the unnatural hair above.
E aprop tire le pel entro desus e intromet aquel en alixati, e sian les pels un o dos o tres e no mays.	And then pull out the hair from beneath and insert the needle again into the eyelid, and let them be one or two or three hairs but no more.
E aprop tira la tua ma am aquel entro que·l pel sia fora-gitat am alixolati en la palpebra am le pel natural.	And then pull out your hand as the hair is extracted by the needle from the eyelid with the natural hair.
Mays si es atirat alixalati e non es gitat le pel, atiraras alixati a las partidas dejos am le fiel le qual tu has compost am aquela, entro qu’en sia gitat alixalati del trau sobira.	However, if it is extracted by the needle but not removed from the eyelid, then you will pull out that thread from the parts where you have placed it, as the hair is extracted from the eyelid with the natural hair above it.
E vegas aquela am la visio del huel, quar lahoras tu gitaras alixati e lo fiel, e grotan quascu e clautz le huel, e laysse le claus per dos dias o tres, entro que·l pel adheresca al sieu loc e nasque sobre aquel bona carn.	And you will dress it with ointment after the extraction of the hair, for you will bandage each and close up the eyelid for two or three days, as the hair adhere to its place and grow new healthy skin.
E si es mays breu le pel, lahoras tu ajusta un pel lonc dels pels naturals, e es elevat am aquel, o que·l leysses entro que sia alonguat aprop alcu spazi, e lehoras tu eleva aquel.	And if the hair is longer, then you will attach a long hair of those which are natural, and it will be elevated by that, or you will let it hang freely after it has been lengthen to some space, and then you will elevate it.
Capitol .xiii.	Chapter .xiii.
De la cura de ehacratir la qual ve en la palpebra desus.	Of the cure of echacratir which appears in the eyelid above.
Quan ve en le huel ehacratir, e es contraccio de la palpebra quan es contrayta en sus, o a dextra o a sinistra partida, per mala consolidacio de plagua o de seccio o de cauteri, e es apelada leporina, e aquesta ahercrati o es natural o accidental, e es fayta per consolidacio de plagua o de seccios o de cauteri, o per semblantz a lor malcuratz.	When there appears in the eyelid echacratir, and it is a contraction of the eyelid when it is pulled to one side or the other, due to poor healing of the wound or the scar or the cautery, and it is called leporina, and this inflammation or is natural or accidental, and it is caused by healing of the wound or scars or cauteries, or by similar things to their diseases.
May la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que tu fendas aquela consolidacio e que separes las labias de lu, e pauses en lu en aquo que es entre aquelas una meca de drap de li, e ligues aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	The manner of the operation on it is that you split that consolidation and separate its lips, and place in it something that is between a cloth made of linen, and tie those so they are healed.
E no cove que tu uses de curacio de lu de las causas las quals exsiccan, constrenho; quar si tu fas aquo retorna alixacratir pus mal que nulh temps no foc habantz.	And do not use for the cure of it any causes which dry out and constrict, for if you do that it returns achacratir worse than before.
Usa en aquela de causas que mollifico ayssi cum es fenugrec, e embroca am la aygua en la qual son coytz altea e semensa de li, o enguent dyaquilon, le qual sia liquefayt am alcu dels olis, e submergeys en aquel la meca, e cura am aquel.	Use for it causes which soften as fenugreek does, and mix with water in which are soaked the flowers of broad beans and seeds of linseed, or with unguent of rose, which has been liquefied by one of the oils, and immerse in that the cloth, and cure it with that.
E lo tesaur de la tua curacio es que tu perforsses am tot engen que no sia consolidat segon la forma que foc al comensament.	And the basis of your cure is that you pierce with total skill so that nothing is consolidated according to its beginning.
E aquesta operacio la qual havem dita, no es sino alcuna rectificacio de ehalixacrati que no retorna la forma del loc segon que foc denant.	And this operation which we have described is not other than some rectification of achalixacti which does not return the shape of its location according to how it was before.
Capitol .xiiii.	Chapter .xiiii.
De la cura de ehacrati le qual es fayt en la palpebra dejos.	Of the cure of achalixacti which is made in the eyelid beneath.
Aquesta alxacrati la qual es fayta en la palpebra dejos, la qual es nompnada vertadierament alxacrati; e es de lu alcuna natural, autra accidental.	This achalixacti which is made in the eyelid beneath, which is named veridieramente achalixacti; and it can be natural or accidental.
Mays accidental es fayta per plagua o per scissura o per cauteri o per autres semblantz.	But accidental is caused by a wound or by a scar or by cautery or by similar things.
E la via de la operacio de lu es que tu prenguas una agula en la qual haga fil doble, e fiques aquela en la carn, e que la fassas passar del lacrimal de senestre entro al lacrimal dextre, entro que·l fil pervengua en las doas extremitatz de la carn.	And the way of the operation on it is that you take a needle with which there are double threads, and insert it into the flesh, and let it pass from the tear duct of the left side to the tear duct of the right, as the thread comes out at both ends of the flesh.
E aprop exten la carn a las partidas desus am la agula e cus aquela am la agula, e inscideys am spatum ample.	And then stretch out the meat at the parts above with the needle and sew that up with the needle, and insert it with a wide spatula.
E donc si retorne la figura de la palpebre segon que cove, bo es; e sino, pren le ray e pausa aquel en la figura fenduda, e am aquel converteys la palpebra, e fen las doas fissuras en le latz de la palpebra dejos.	And then return the shape of the eyelid according to what is appropriate; and if not, take the thread and place it in the split figure, and with that, convert the eyelid, and split the two fissures on the side of the eyelid below.
E sian las extremitatz de las doas fissuras de dos angles de la inscizio, la qual has fayta entro que concurren, e sia de lor fayt angle entro que quan se congreguan sia fayta figura de lor.	And let the extremes of the two slits be at the two angles of the incision which you have made so that they meet; and an angle should be made from them so that when they come together, a figure is formed from them.
E aquesta figura es letra greca: la landa.	And this figure is the Greek letter: lambda.
E aprop osta la carn aquela per la quantitat que es le latz de lu agut dejos de lu, aquo que siec la palpebra.	Then hold that meat up by the amount that is the width of his eye under him, which cuts off the eyelid.
E aprop ajusta las partz seperadas e cos aquelas am le fil de lana; e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit de las medicinas mollificativas e de las calguas entro que sia sanat.	Then bring together the separated parts and sew those up with the thread of wool; and then treat those with what we have said about the softening medicines, and the poultices until he is healed.
E si alxacrati endeve per fissura o sutura o cauteri, lahoras cove que tu fendas am fissura plana sobre les pels de la palpebra segon que es precedit.	And if it becomes infected through the slit or stitch or cautery, then make a flat slit with the slit on the skin of the eyelid as has been described.
E aprop separa am la calgua entre doas labias segon que havem dit.	Then separate them with the poultice between two lips as we have said.
En la suma del sermo de la cura de alxacrati quan es desus o dejos, que corra en lu operacio, segon que es preparat de la forma de alxacrati, e aquela es en forma de motas diversitatz.	In the summary of the speech of the cure for infection whether it is above or below, let the operation run on him according to how he was prepared in the form of infection; and that has many different forms.
E le artifexs savi totz temps prepara engen en quascuna manieyra la qual es possibla a lu entro que fassa retornar la figura a la forma natural, o prop de aquela, e aquel malaute segon que a lu conveneys de la operacio e dels strumentz en las majors disposicios.	And the skilled doctors always prepare their plans in every way that is possible for them so that they can return the figure to its natural shape, or close to it; and the patient according to what he needs from the operation and the instruments in the most suitable conditions.
Capitol .xv.	Chapter 15
De la adherencia de la palpebra am la conjunctiva o am la cornea.	Of the adhesion of the eyelid with the conjunctiva or with the cornea.
Quan accideys aquesta consolidacio a motz homes enayssi que sia solidada la palpebra pus desus am le album del huel, e sia prohibida de la facilitat del movement e de las suas obras naturals, donc cove que tu entrometas la extramitat del ray dejos la palpebra, e eleva en sus aquela, o exten aquela am le unci.	When this consolidation happens to many people that the eyelid is glued to the white of the eye, and it is prohibited from the facility of movement and its natural works, then you must insert the end of the thread under the eyelid, and lift it up there; or stretch it with the ointment.
E aprop tu inscideys la adherencia am spatum subtil, le qual no sia am acuitat de las inscisios, habantz obtus un petit per so que·l malaute no sia inquietat deves la operacio, e remau le spatum que no ledesca le huel am la sua acuitat.	Then you insert the adhesion with a thin spatula, which is not sharp on the edges, having been made blunt a little so that the patient is not disturbed by the operation, and let the spatula not cut the eye with its sharpness.
E sia la tua inscizio quays excorjan aquela adherencia am facilitat entro que sia retornada la palpebra segon la sua forma natural e que sia sanada tota la adherencia.	And let your incision cut through that adhesion with ease so that the eyelid is returned to its natural shape and that the whole adhesion is healed.

Then separate between the eyelid and the eye with the poultice of it, and put on the eye wool infused in white of egg; and then use it for three days with healing causes so that it is healed.
Capitol .xvi.	Chapter 16
De inscizio de ungla e de eminencia de carn dels lacrimals.	Of incision of nail and prominence of meat of the tear ducts.
Sapias que ungla es segon dos manieyras, quar o es nervosa, e es semblant a ciphac dur subtil; o es no-nervosa, semblant a humiditat blanca congilada, la qual quan ferr la toca, o es forsat aquela prendre am onci, es abscindida e le onci no es ficat en lu.	Know that the nail is according to two ways; one is nervous, and it is like a thin hard cipack; or it is not-nervous, like white humidity congealed, which when the iron touches it, it either takes up the ointment, or it is cut off and the ointment is not put in it.
E amdos las specias no comensan sino del lacrimal major entro que va petit a petit que cobre la vista e prohibeys le lum e·l movement de huel.	And both kinds do not heal except by the large tear duct which goes little by little to cover the sight and prohibits the light and the movement of the eye.

But the way of operating in the incision of it is that the patient leans his head to you; then open his eyes, and lift up the eyelid with your hand, and then gather the nail with ointment of little doubling, and stretch it to the parts above.

Then you insert the remainder in the roots of the tear duct with a thin spatula or with small forceps; and cut the meat of the natural tear duct so that through the incision of it, there are not continuous flows of tears.

E guarda te que am le spatum no toques la tunica cornea e que avengua en lu ruptura, e que la pupilla sia perforada.	And be careful that with the spatula you do not touch the corneal tunic and that there is rupture in it; and that the pupil is perforated.
Aprop la inscizio geta en le huel un pauc de sal trissa o di cief fayt de siniar, e leyssa aquel entro al autre dia; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que cove entro que sia sanat.	Then put in the eye a little of ground salt or ash made from vinegar, and let it be until the next day; then cure that with what is appropriate so that it heals.

And if the nail is not nervous and you cannot put the needle in it or it is not stuck in it, then many times this kind of nail is cured with medicines, and is healed thus with the eye and composed in the division.
E si tu vols inscindir aquela, lahoras tu obre le huel del malaute e pren spatum subtil leon de freul acuitat segon aquesta forma:	And if you want to cut it, then open the eye of the patient and take lion' s spatula of sharp iron according to this form:
am subtilitat.	with thinness.

Then repeat the operation on it until everything that is of it has been healed; unless the opposite pustule cauterize in the eye, because then you cut it and cure the pustule at the beginning so that it is healed.

La emenencia de la carn lacrimal, si notz en le huel per gran nocument, sia suspendut am onci; e inscideys aquela de aquela una partida, e no ultimes la inscizio per so que no inscidesqua fluxs de lagremas.	The prominence of the meat of the tear duct, if noted in the eye with great damage, is suspended by ointment; and insert it at one end, and do not complete the incision so that you do not cause flows of tears.
E aprop distilla en le lacrimal cief rog e fayt de siniar entro que sia sanat.	Then distil in the tear duct vinegar made from vinegar until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter 17
De inscizio de alguazardenic e de aquo que es nascut de carn ajustada en le huel.	Of incision of alar-sack and what has come from meat pressed in the eye.
Alcunas veguadas en les huels de alcus es nascuda carn roga, e es sobre-pausada entro que cobre la pupilla, o apropinqua o estrenh sobre las palpebras e fort leu comprem las palpebras a las partidas deforo e es assemblada a roza de balaustra.	Sometimes in the eyes of some is born meat like rope, and it is pressed in so that it covers the pupil, or it approaches or narrows on the eyelids, and it strongly presses the eyelids to the front and it assembles to the rope of a bowstring.
Mays la operacio en lu es que·l malaute pausa le sieu cap en le tieu se; e aprop obre les huels de aquel e colligeys tota aquela carn am oncis convenientz ad aquo, e te aquo am una forcep o am cesti; e aprop inscindiys la carn el comensament entro que tot sia finit am le encisori, e guarda te del huel que no ledescas aquel deves la tua operacio.	But the operation on it is that the patient leans his head to you; then open its eyes and gather all that meat with convenient pins towards that, and have that a forceps or a basket; then cut the meat at the beginning so that everything is finished by the scissors, and be careful of the eye that it does not get cut by your operation.
E sia la tua inscizio am la qual inscides aquelas o am espatum le qual nos havem recomtat en la inscizio de la ungla, o am petitas forfexs am las quals es colligit ascebel segon que vindra la forma de lu aprop aquest capitol.	And let your incision be with which you cut those or with the spatula by which we have recommended in the incision of the nail, or with small forceps with which it is gathered according to that comes the shape of it then this chapter.
Donc cum es complida la tua inscizio e es remauguda tota aquela carn, lahoras omple le huel de sal trissa, o destilla en lu polvera roga e semblantz a lu de las medicinas corrossivas, e pausa sobre le huel deforo coto am album de huou entro que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	Then when your incision is completed and the meat has been cut off, then fill the eye with ground salt or distil in it vinegar powder and similar to it of the medicines that cause scorching, and put on the eye from the front cotto with white of egg so that it is secured from pustule cauterize.
E si roman alcuna causa de alguardenici e es senhoragat sanc caut, e temes apostema caut, lahoras leyssa le huel e cura aquela apostema am aquo que ceda aquela apostema, e aprop itera sobre aquel am operacio entro que sia sanat, e semblantment fay en la carn ajustada la qual accideys en le huel de aquesta especia.	And if you find any cause of ulceration and there is pus and fear of abscess, then open the wound and treat that abscess with something that will drain that abscess, and then repeat on that wound until it is healed, and do the same for the flesh around which has become infected due to that type of wound.
Mays empero tu cove que alienes tota curacio del huel freul per via natural o per via accidental, obran am ferr, e no metas la tua ma en alcuna de aquestas operacios entro que veges que aquel membre sia suffertant aquela operacio.	However, you must avoid all treatment of the wound through natural or accidental means, using tools made of iron, and do not put your hand in any of these operations until you see that member suffering from that operation.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter 18.
De colleccio de sabel en le huel.	On the collection of pus in the wound.
Sabel so venas rogas las quals son testudas sobre le huel e prohibeysso al vesement la sua operacio, e develican le huel am longitut de dias.	Pus is red veins that are hardened on the wound and prevent healing; they open the wound for a long time.
Donc necessari es al comensament que tu consideres si le huel en le qual es sabel es fort e en lu no es autra malautia que sabel, lahoras tu colligeys aquel sabel.	Therefore, it is necessary at the beginning for you to consider whether the wound in which there is pus is strong and does not have any other disease than pus; then collect that pus.
E es que tu comandes al malaute que pause le sieu cap en le tieu se, e aprop suspen aquelas venas am un onci o am dos segon la tua prudencia; e sia aquel onci de subtil duplicacio segon aquesta forma:	And command the patient to lean their head on you, and then suspend those veins with a needle or two depending on your discretion; that needle should be of a subtle double thread according to this form:
o so dos oncis gradantment en un cos segon aquesta forma:	or two needles gradiently in one body according to this form:
E aprop sian colligidas aquelas venas am forses subtils, am subtilitat, e abstergeys le sanc hora aprop hora, entro que vegas aquelas venas esser remaugudas del huel e sian revolgudas.	And collect those veins with subtle threads, with subtlety, and wipe the blood hour by hour, until you see those veins being sucked into the wound and being rolled up.
E guarda te que tu no ledes le huel am las extremitatz del spatum; e si’ la tua operacio en le miegjorn denant le solelh, e sias mot ferm en la tua operacio que no inscidas sino aquelas venas.	And be careful not to cut the wound with the edge of the spatula; and if your operation is in the middle of the sole, and remain motionless during your operation so that you do not insert anything except those veins.
E quan tu auras complitz, lahoras tu distilla en le huel cief vert o rog per que am sa acuitat corrodesca aquo que es remaugut del sabel.	And when you are finished, then you distill on the wound chief vinegar or red wine so that with its acuity it corrodes what has been sucked from the pus.
Mays si aquo no es a tu possible colligeys tot en aquela hora, e lahoras tu emplastra tot am aquo que cede la dolor de lu, e leyssa lu per alcus dias entro que sia sedada la dolor de lu e que sia asegurat de apostema caut.	But if it is not possible for you to collect all in that hour, then dress the whole with something that relieves its pain, and let it be for a few days until its pain is relieved and it is secured from abscess.
E aprop itera sobre lu segon que la mateyssa manieyra entro que sia sanat.	And repeat on it according to the former manner until it is healed.
E aquesta es la forma de las forfexs:	And this is the form of the tweezers:
Capitol .xix.	Chapter 19.
De reduccio de arizati al nas.	On the reduction of hernia in the nose.
Quan tu curas arisati am cauteri o am medicina aguda comburent segon que es precedida la narracio de lu e no es sanat, lahoras no es engen en lu sino que fendas sobre le apostema deves la maturitat de lu, e que extraguas tota la humiditat la qual es en lu e·l poyre entro que sia descubert le os.	When you treat hernia with cautery or with a sharp medicine according to what is preceded in its narration and it is not healed, then there is nothing in it but that you split on the abscess according to the maturity of it, and draw out all the moisture which is in it and the pus until the bone is exposed.
E donc cum es descubert le os e vezes en lu corrupcio o negror, lahoras tu ratz lu am un sturment del qual aquesta es la forma:	And therefore when the bone is exposed and you see corruption or blackness in it, then you scrape it with an instrument of which this is the form:
E es nompnat de aspre cap, e sia feyt de fer indi, e sia le cap redon ayssi cum asir le qual sia fayt punctat per punctacio de lima o aliskalfati per punctacio subtil (ayssi cum es en la forma seguent).	And it is named from rough head, and let it be made of hard iron, and let the head be round like a file which is made pointed by filing or polished with a subtle file (just as in the following form).
E pausa aquel sobre le loc corrumput del os, e aprop revolveys aquel entre les tieus ditz, e prem la tua ma petit a petit entro que sapias que aquela corropcio es rasa.	And place that on the corrupted part of the bone, and then roll it between your fingers, and press your hand little by little until you know that corruption is scraped.
E aquo sia fayt alcunas veguadas, e aprop restaura le loc am causas exsiccativas e stipticas.	And that should be done several times, and then heal the place with astringent and styptic causes.
Donc si·l loc es consolidat e es en lu nascuda bona carn e es abscindit le cors de la sania e roman per xl dias, e no es renovat e no es apostemat e no accideys en lu accident, lahoras tu sapias que es sanat.	Therefore if the place is consolidated and good flesh has grown on it and the body is cut off from the wound and there is no abscess and no incident happens in it and it does not become inflamed, then you know that it is healed.
E sino, lahoras no es en lu engen sino reduzir la fissura a la forma del nas, e segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu descuebras de segon os am ferr o am medicina acuta, e cum sira descubert le os, lahoras tu pren tribo segon aquesta forma:	But if not, then there is nothing in it except to reduce the fracture to the form of the nose, and according to this manner: and it is that you uncover from the bone with iron or sharp medicine, and when the bone is exposed, then you take ash according to this form:
Sia la extramitat de lu ferr triangulada, e·l fust de lu sia prim extenuat entro a la extremitat ayssi cum vezes assi.	Let its outer end be triangular, and let its shaft be cut straight to the outer end just as it is seen.
E aprop pausa aquel sobre le os, e sia aquel prop del lacrimal; e alongua la tua ma un pauc del huel, e aprop revol la tua ma am le tribo entro que penetre tot le os, e aquel sente le malaute per asso que atroba vent yssir per so quan te la sua ma.	And then place that on the bone, and let it be close to the tear duct; and lengthen your hand a little from the wound, and then roll your hand with the tribe until it penetrates all the bone, and that feels the patient through breath coming out of him when you press his hand.
Donc lahoras restaura le loc am medicinas stipticas exsiccantz ayssi cum t’e eyssenhat.	Therefore then heal the place with astringent and drying medicines just as you have dried it.
Donc cum nays la carn e·l loc es endurazit, lahoras la materia la qual effundia a las partidas deforo retorna al nas, donc aquo es pus leugier sobre le malaute.	And when the flesh and the place are hardened, then the matter which oozed to the edges of the hole returns to the nose; therefore that is pus coming out on the patient.
Capitol .xx.	Chapter 20.
De reduccio de la eminencia del huel.	On the reduction of the prominence of the wound.
Quan le huel emineys am la sua totalitat e no accideys en le vezement nocument ni diminuacio, lahoras cove que laxas le malaute, e aprop que·l segues, e aprop que pausas ventozas en le cervitz ses scarificacio e succa per bona succaccio; e aprop pausa sobre le huel liniment le qual sia fayt de acatra e aloe e enses e sarcocolla, e aprop strenh le emplaustre sobre le huel am motz polvils.	When the wound protrudes with its entirety and there is no incident of harm or diminution in it, then you should loosen the patient, and then that he breathes and sucks through good sucking; and then place liniment which is made of myrrh and aloe and oil and mastic over the wound, and then strengthen the bandage over the wound with strong powdery bandages.
E la manieyra dels polvils es que prenguas draps de li leons motz, e quascun drap sia duplicat en quatre plecs; e fay de aquels motz.	And the manner of the powdery bandages is that you take linen cloths thin, and each cloth be folded into four folds; and make those plies.
E aprop pausa aquels la un sobre le autre segon la quantitat de la qual ha le huel necessitat.	And then place those one over the other according to the quantity of which the wound has need.
E aprop strenh sobre aquels am drap dur am fort strictura; e itera las ventosas am succio ses scarificacio; e aprop osta las ventosas e leyssa le huel streyt le dia e la nueyt.	And then tighten over those with a hard cloth with strong compression; and repeat the cupping with sucking without scarification; and then place the cups and let the wound be tight during the day and the night.
Mays si entretant le liguament es mollificat, lahoras cove que sia mot streyt.	But if in between the ligament is softened, then you should make it strong.
E aprop osta le liament aprop le dia e la nueyt ayssi cum havem dit.	And then place the ligature during the day and the night just as we have said.
E si vezes le huel ja esser redusit, bo es, e sino, lahoras itera le emplastre am les polvils e la strictura e las ventosas entro que sia sanat.	And if you see that the wound is already reduced, well then; but if not, then repeat the bandage with the powdery bandages and the compression and the cupping until it is healed.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 21.
De la inscizio de la eminencia de la tunica uvea.	On the incision of the prominence of the venous membrane.
Quan endeve disrupcio en la tunica uvea, e aprop es eminent e procezeys fora las palpebras ayssi cum un gra de rasim, e es orrazada la forma de home per aquo, e vols aquo inscidir, lahoras la operacio en lu es ayssi cum havem recomtat, que tu entrometas la agula en la razitz de la uvea de la partida dejos en la partida desus, e aprop met la agula autra en la qual sia fil doble de la part del lacrimal, e fay aquela penetrar e leyssa la primieyra agula segon la sua disposicio; e aprop inscideys le loc del fiel doble e leva am aquel la partida de la uvea en le circuit de la agula, e strenh aquela mot.	When there is disruption in the venous membrane, and then it is prominent and proceeds out of the eyelids just as with a grain of sand, and its shape is man-like for that, and you want to incise it, then the operation on it is just as we have prescribed, that you insert the needle into the root of the vein from the lower part towards the upper part, and then insert the other needle in which there is a double thread of the tear duct, and make that penetrate and let the first needle according to its disposition; and then incise the place of the double thread and lift with it the membrane of the vein around the needle, and tighten that.
E aprop extratz la agula e pausa sobre le huel lana infusa en album de huou e leyssa entro que cayha le fil am la uva.	And then pull out the needle and place over the wound wool infused in white wine and let it until the thread falls off with the vein.
E aprop cura le huel am aquo que conforte aquel entro que la plagua sia sanada.	And then heal the wound with that which comforts that until the ulcer is healed.
E alcunas veguadas aduna de tota partida am cercle de drap entro le huel ajuste eminencia gran, e aprop sia perforat am le spatum subtil que vengua al preon del huel, e corra la humiditat albuginea, e descen le huel e intra tantost.	And several times gather from all parts with a circle of cloth around the wound, and then let it be penetrated by the spatula subtly so that the white moisture comes out, and the wound goes down and as long as it has not healed.
E aprop strenh entro que sia sanat.	And then tighten until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
De curacio de alconati.	On the cure of alconitis.
Aquesta malautia que es apelada alconati no es sino sania la qual es ajustada en le huel semblant a aygua dessendent e no es aquela.	This disease which is called alconitis is not but an ulcer which is formed in the wound like water descending, and it is not that.
Mays la manieyra del obrar en ela es que fasses le malaute sezer sobre la sela aparelada e dreyta, e aprop pren le cap sieu en las tuas mas de doas partz e mau aquel entro que veias la sania pervenir a las partidas dejos, e aprop sia siccada e no descenda, e sia ostat le lum, e·l malaute veia las causas ayssi cum vezia.	But the manner of working on it is that you make the patient sit upright on the chair with his head held up by both hands and look down; and then take the head in your hands from two parts and hold him so that you see the ulcer coming to the lower parts, and then let it be dried and not go down, and let there be light, and the patient sees the causes just as he looks.
E si no descendra en jos, sapias que es aygua.	And if it will not come down, know that it is water.
Mays si no es preparat le descendement a la sania am aquo que havem dit, lahoras fay le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e aprop pren spatum subtil e fen am aquel sobre le pannicol cernent un petit deves la continuacio de la conjunctiva am la tunica cornea en la corona (entro al loc vuet), entro que sia fora-getada la sania.	But if the discharge is not prepared to come out in the way that we have said, then make the patient cough between his hands and then take a sharp stick and poke it into the skin surface over the panniculus carnosus about a small distance from the continuation of the conjunctiva into the tunica cornea at the crown (into the place where one wants), until the discharge comes out.
Donc cum es fora-getada, lahoras tu distilla en le huel aygua cauda en la qual has mesclat mel o aygua en la qual ja has bulit fenugrec e mel.	Once it is discharged, then you distil into the wound water in which you have mixed honey or water in which you have boiled fenugreek and honey.
E aprop sia curat am las autras causas entro que sia sanat.	And let it be cured with the other remedies until it is healed.
Capitol .xxii.	Chapter 22.
De la curacio de la aygua descendent del huel.	Of the cure for a wound from which water discharges.
Ja havem dit las specias de la aygua en la divisio e qual conveneys a perforar am sermo declarant, lahoras aquel segon la sanetat.	We have already said about the types of water in the division and according to the health condition, then it is necessary to pierce with a needle, describing it as follows:
Lahoras cove que tu fassas sezer le malaute entre las tuas mas sobre un cayrat e lia le sieu huel sa, lu mot stringent.	Then you should make the patient cough between his hands over a container and collect the water that discharges from him, then bind it tightly.
E aprop pausa prop de la palpebra del sieu huel la tua ma senestra, si le huel en le qual es l’aygua es le huel senestra; o am la tua ma dreyta, si le huel es le dextre.	Then place your left hand near the eyelid of his eye, if the eye from which the water discharges is on the left side; or with your right hand, if it is on the right side.
E aprop am la tua ma dextra pren almagda, si le huel es senestre; o am la tua ma senestra, si le huel es de dreyt.	And then take alum with your right hand, if the eye is on the left side; or with your left hand, if the eye is on the right side.
E aprop pausa la extremitat de almagda prop de la corona per la grossesa del ray en le album del huel de part del mendre lacrimal, e aprop enpelleys almagda am vertut e revol la tua ma am aquel.	And then place the end of the alum near the edge of the cornea over the thickness of the membrane in the white part of the eye at the smaller tear duct, and push the alum with strength and rotate your hand with it.
E aprop penetre en le album del huel e sentas que almagda ja es pervenguda a causa vueda.	And then penetrate into the membrane of the eye and feel that the alum has already reached the cause of the vision.
E cove que sia la masura del cami de almagda al preon la mesura del spazi le qual es de la pupilla entro a la fi de la negror, e es la corona del huel; quar tu veyras am aquel pupilla am la visio de l’huel per la clartat de la tunica cornea.	And when it is the distance of the path of the alum to the pupil the measurement of the space that is from the pupil to the edge of the blackness, and it is the cornea of the eye; for you will see with it the pupil with the vision of the eye through the clarity of the tunica cornea.
E aprop pausa almagda entro al loc en le qual es l’aygua, e aprop tu la atira en jos una veguada aprop autra, e donc si la aygua descen tantost, lahoras vetz le malaute aquo sobre le qual huebre la sua vista tantost, e almagda en le sieu huel.	And then place the alum into the place where the water is, and then you draw it down another time, and thus if the water descends immediately, then you see the patient above on which he opens his sight immediately, and the alum in his eye.
E aprop repausa se un pauc; donc si la aygua es descenduda, lahoras tu depausa aquela autre veguada abantz que almagda ne sia getada.	And then rest a little; therefore if the water has discharged, then you remove that other compression before the alum is applied.
E donc quan es sicada e no descen, lahoras tu extrat almagda am facilitat, e revol am aquel la tua ma pauc a pauc, e aprop dissolveys en l’aygua un petit de sal clara de gemma e am aquela lava le huel dedintz; e aprop pausa fora le huel coto o stopa o lana infusa en oli rozat e album de huou e ligua am aquo le huel sa.	And then when it is dry and does not discharge, then you extract the alum with ease, and rotate your hand a little by little with it; and then dissolve in the water a little of white clear salt of gemma and wash the eye inside; and then place over the eye a cotton or stop or wool soaked in rose oil and egg white with that which is the eye.
Mays nos e aquels que so de nostre temps pause sobre aquel comi trissat am album de huou.	But we and those who are of our time place over it cooked rice with egg white.
E si no obezeys a tu almagda al intrament de l’huel per la sua duricia — quar es alcu dels homes del qual le huel es dur mot —, lahoras cove que prenguas le spatum le qual es nompnat alberid del qual aquesta es la forma:	But if it does not obey you, the alum to the instrument of the eye because of its hardness — for it is one of those men of which the eye is very hard —, then take the stick which is named “alberid,” of which this is the form:
E donc perfora am aquel aquela conjunctura, e no ultimes la tua ma en le trauc, e no es si no que fassas via ad almagda loc subtil.	And then pierce with it that conjunctiva, and do not pierce your hand in the hole, and do not cease until you have made way for the alum to a subtle place.
E aprop entromet almagda segon que havem dit.	And then insert the alum as we have said.
E deves le compliment de la tua obra, sia preparat al malaute dormitori descentment fayt en le qual dorma sobre le sieu dos en mayson tenebrosa, e sia prohibit de totz movementz .	And after you have finished your work, let the patient be prepared for sleep in a dark room in which he sleeps on his back in darkness, and all movements are prohibited.
E pausa en la natura de lu aquo per que sia linida la sua natura, e no maugua le sieu cap a la partida dreyta ni senestra de tot.	And place over his head that which makes the nature of him to be cool, and do not turn his head to either the right or left at all.
E sia le liament segon la sua disposicio entro al tertz dia.	And let there be the poultice according to his disposition on the third day.
E aprop deslia aquel en aquela maysso tenebrosa e exproha la freol vista, e fay li vezer alcunas causas, e aprop retorna le liament entro al dia .vii.	And then take off that in the morning darkness and let him see some things, and then return the poultice on the seventh day.
E no cove que fassas aquo en la hora de las curacios o tantost aprop la infusio.	And do not do this in the hour of the poultices or immediately after that; also let there be an infusion.
Habantz cove que tu alienes aquo per so quar la aygua puega leugierament per gran e vehement de reguardament.	Let it be until you remove that so that the water can flow freely and vehement from retention.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que deslias le huel denant le vii dia, e rectifica aquel am aquo que ceda apostema.	But if pustules happen, then let there be poultice until the seventh day, and rectify that with water that softens pustules.
Lahoras tu absol la vista de lu e pausa sobre la cara de lu oral per le qual sia regit le vezement de lu dejos lu per alcus dias, lu existent en la mayszo tenebrosa.	Then you open the sight of him and place over his face oil that he may regulate his gaze below him for several days, existing in darkness.
E aprop sia gitat de aquela mayzo gradantment e conversa8 en las suas causas.	And then let there be poultice gently and conversation with him about some things.
E sapias que in alchatea no es excusat le discipol de visio alcunas veguadas, e lahoras tu sias ardit sobre la operacio.	And know that in cataract it is not excused the disciple of sight some views, and then you feel ardor over the operation.
E ja es pervengut a nos de alcu de aquels les quals so al Artach , e alcu disse que fayt foc en al Ayrac magdaam perforat am le qual es succada la aygua.	And it has come to us from some of those who are in the Artach , and someone said that when fire was made in Ayrac a magdaam was perforated with which is sucked water.
Mays empero yeu non e vist degu en la nostra terra le qual haia perfeyt aquo, ni e aquo legit en alcu dels libres dels antics; e es possible que aquo sia novel.	But nevertheless I have not seen that in our land which he has performed it, nor is it read in any of the books of the ancients; and it is possible that this is new.
E aquestas so las formas de las specias de magdaan per que sia sobre aquelas aquel le qual ignora aquelas:	And these are the forms of magdaam so that it is over those who do not know them:
E sian faytas de eram o de ferr propriament, e sian las extramitatz de lor am aquesta subtilitat triangulada, la extremitat aguda ayssi cum aquela es la forma.	And they are made of gold or of iron properly, and they are the extremities of them with this subtle triangular shape, the acute extremity as well; that is the form.
Capitol .xxiv.	Chapter 24.
De la curacio de carn nada en le nas.	Of the cure of a swelling in the nose.
Quan en le nas so nascudas carns diversas ajustadas de las quals es alcuna causa la qual es assemblada a scorpio de motz pes, o a polip peys; e aquesta malautia es apelada polipus quar es a semblansa de aquel peys representat.	When in the nose there are various swellings of which is some cause which is attached to scorpio of hair feet, or to polyps of hair; and this illness is called polypus because it is of the appearance of that hair represented.
E de lu es carn cancrosa, lapadea, de fusca color; e de lu es que es carn leon no de color fusca.	And from him there is swollen flesh, flaccid, of dusky color; and from him there is that is not leon not of dusky color.
Donc en aquela que es en aquestas carns leon no fraudulenta ni cancroza, cove que fassas le malaute sezer entre las tuas mas e posat al solelh, e huebre las nars de lu, e picoys le tieu onci en aquelas carns.	Therefore in that which is in these flesh not fraudulent or cancerous, let there be the patient lying between your hands and exposed to the sun, and open his nose, and rub the eye of him in that flesh.
E aprop extrat aquela a las partidas deforo, e aprop inscindeys aquo que has comprehendut de aquelas am spatum agut subtil de la una partida entro que sapias que tota la carn ja es ostada; que si roman de lu deguna causa de la qual la abscisio es possibla, lahoras tu ratz aquo am la un dels estrumentz subtils am facilitat entro que de lu romangua denguna causa.	And then extract that to the foramen, and then pierce with that which you have understood with a sharp stick from the foramen, and if when you have drawn it there is no cause from which the abscission is possible, then rub that with one of the subtle instruments with ease from which there is no cause.
Mays si senhoreja am sanc o accida apostema caut, lahoras tu pausa a lu aquo que cove; o es dels apostemas malignes, lahoras tu coyta e cauteriza aquel entro que sia abscindit sanc e sian ostadas las cavas totas.
